incident_updates.body:
• 2018-11-02 16:39:09 - We are investigating reports of elevated error rates.
  • 2018-11-02 16:43:54 - GitHub.com currently has an elevated exception rate. We're deploying a fix to mitigate this issue.
  • 2018-11-02 17:29:28 - A fix has been deployed to address exceptions. We're continuing to monitor as the site recovers.
  • 2018-11-02 17:48:26 - GitHub.com is continuing to recover. Notifications and deployment statuses may be delayed while we process a backlog.
  • 2018-11-02 18:18:29 - We're continuing to process background jobs. Notifications and deployment statuses may be delayed during this time.
  • 2018-11-02 18:50:32 - Deployment status jobs have been processed. We're continuing to handle a backlog of notifications and are monitoring as they are delivered.
  • 2018-11-02 19:34:13 - We're continuing to process notifications and are monitoring the backlog.
  • 2018-11-02 20:07:01 - We're continuing to process notifications and monitor the backlog.
  • 2018-11-02 20:43:37 - We continue to process notifications and monitor progress against the backlog.
  • 2018-11-02 21:25:17 - Everything operating normally.
